title: Should news publishers be on Apple News? A U.K. report finds mixed results
description: Apple News shares revenue with news publishers and — as a preinstalled app on Apple products — reaches an astounding number of users. Should publishers share their journalism on the app? Or focus on growing their own garden with first-party data and direct subscriptions? The U.K.-based subscription research company Enders Analysis investigated the question in a...
